notes: The ReStore raises funds by selling merchandise and, after expenses, uses all profits to build more homes.  Habitat also provides families an opportunity to buy building materials that they may not otherwise be able to afford. This will help raise the standards of housing. The Habitat ReStore takes most materials and the staff will be glad to talk with you.
